amendment.description: An amendment offered en bloc to increase funds (by transfer) in the amount of $19.667 milllion for APHIS (Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service) accounts.

action.text: Mr. Bonilla raised a point of order against the Weiner amendment (A006). The amendment seeks to amend portions of the bill not yet read for amendment, is not budget neutral, and cannot be offered in its present form. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Weiner.
